content: for a girl ws k to last 35 35 40 sts *yo k2tog k5 5 6 sts repeat from * 4 times more k6 more row and then bobble all sts in k sew 5 buttons onto the front sew the underarm seam weave in all ends ©2014 plymouth yarn company 091914vle designed by vanessa ewing abbreviations beg= begin ning bobble= bind off co= cast on cont= continue decrease= decrease dpn= double pointed needle m= marker patt= pattern pm= place marker p = purl rem= remain ning repeat= repeat round=round rs= right side sl = slip ssk = slip 1 st as if to knit slip a second st as if to knit knit them together through the back loop st s = stitch es st st = stockinette st decrease = together ws= wrong side
